blockentity.realfilingreborn.name: Filing Cabinet
tooltip.realfilingreborn.capacity_info: Increases range to 16 blocks and cabinet limit to 128
message.realfilingreborn.index_card_link: Index Card linked to Filing Index
message.realfilingreborn.index_card_not_: Index Card must be linked to a Filing Index first
message.realfilingreborn.index_card_need: Index Card can only be linked to a Filing Index
tooltip.realfilingreborn.index_card_unli: Right-click on a Filing Index to link
message.realfilingreborn.index_occupied: Filing Cabinet already has an Index Card
message.realfilingreborn.index_at_max_ca: Filing Index is at max capacity (128)
message.realfilingreborn.index_at_base_c: Filing Index is at Max capacity (64). To add more, use the Capacity upgrade
message.realfilingreborn.index_no_longer: The linked Filing Index no longer exists
message.realfilingreborn.folder_not_empt: Folder must be empty to erase assignment
message.realfilingreborn.folder_not_assi: Folder is not assigned to any item
message.realfilingreborn.no_folders: Filing Cabinet can only accept folders
message.realfilingreborn.folder_full: Folder cannot store any more items
message.realfilingreborn.standard_folder: Folder cannot store items with unique properties. Use NBT Folder
message.realfilingreborn.nbt_folder_requ: Folder can only store items with unique properties
tooltip.realfilingreborn.eraser_info: Right-click while holding an empty folder to erase its assignment
tooltip.realfilingreborn.unregistered_fo: Folder is unassigned. Add items to assign it
tooltip.realfilingreborn.standard_folder: Can only store normal items (no NBT)
tooltip.realfilingreborn.nbt_standard_fo: Can only store items with unique properties (NBT)
tooltip.realfilingreborn.nbt_unregistere: NBT Folder is unassigned. Add items with unique properties to assign it
tooltip.realfilingreborn.jade.empty_cabi: Cabinet is empty. Right click to insert folders
